overview: YOU'RE INVITED to Smosh's Sleepover Live, a 2-hour non-stop party packed with pillow fights, musical improv, and sleepover-themed versions of your favorite Smosh shows! And stay up extra-late with us for a 30-minute VIP after-show, where we'll answer questions from the audience & more. Throw on your favorite pajamas, and get ready for an unforgettable night!
title: SMOSH SLEEPOVER LIVE!
